sourcesContent:
{{dialogTitle}}
Name face @if (proForm.get('name')?.hasError('required')) { Name is required }
Department Mechanical Science Mathematics Computer Civil @if (proForm.get('department')?.hasError('required')) { Department is required }
Gender Male Female Other @if (proForm.get('gender')?.hasError('required')) { Gender is required }
Degree school @if (proForm.get('degree')?.hasError('required')) { Department is required }
Mobile phone @if (proForm.get('mobile')?.hasError('required')) { Mobile is required }
Email email @if (proForm.get('email')?.hasError('required') || proForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Joining date @if (proForm.get('date')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
